description: Mallow`s Father is the head chef and owner of the Aina Cafeteria located on Melemele Island in the Alola Region. He has a lot of really delicious dishes on their menu. His daughter Mallow`s dream is to make Aina Cafeteria the number one cafeteria in Alola. She hopes that the Mythical Alola Stew will become a signature dish to make at their cafeteria popular and thus get lots of people to try her father`s cooking.
name: Mao no Chichioya
